item.description: Please join us for a tour of the premier yarn shops on Boston's North Shore.  This will be an all day event with stops for lunch/coffee/snacks as needed.  We'll attempt to visit each and every shop before dropping-off our passports (free raffle tickets) at the final location.  This has been a lot of fun in the past and introduced members to some great shops they might not have known existed!  Come join us!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the parking lot at Starbucks to carpool. If you can help with driving please let us know!
item.name: North Shore Yarn Crawl
